game.name: Antediluvial : Yalroc Island
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Freshly enrolled in the Empress's personal guard, you are assigned to investigate an island cut off from the world and whose inhabitants refuse to submit to the authority of the empire. Discover the secrets of the island, doomed to disappear in a ruthless flood. You have 3 days to change everything.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Freshly enrolled in the Empress's personal guard, you are assigned to investigate an island cut off from the world and whose inhabitants refuse to submit to the authority of the empire. Discover the secrets of the island, doomed to disappear in a ruthless flood. You have 3 days to change everything.
